document.full_text: taylor swift has joined the ensemble voicecast of "dr. seuss' the lorax," universal pictures and illumination entertainment's cgi-animated adaptation of the children's book classic.
document.title: taylor swift joins cast of "dr. seuss' the lorax"
lines_and_colors: taylor swift has joined the ensemble voicecast of "dr. seuss' the lorax," universal pictures and illumination entertainment's cgi-animated adaptation of the children's book classic.
